Title: Relates to the student mental health apprenticeship retention and training (SMART) internship grant program
Summary: Establishes a student mental health apprenticeship retention and training (SMART) internship grant program; prescribes conditions for the administration of the student mental health apprenticeship retention and training (SMART) internship grant program; requires the promulgation of necessary rules and regulations.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to establishing a student mental health apprenticeship retention and training (SMART) internship grant program
